mapper.select: SELECT PT_NO, PT_TITLE, PT_CONTENT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "PETITION_LIKE" SUB WHERE SUB.PT_NO = MAIN.PT_NO) PT_LIKE_COUNT FROM "PETITION" MAIN WHERE PT_DEL_FL = 'N' AND USER_NO = #{UserNo}

SELECT PT_NO, PT_TITLE, PT_CONTENT, USER_NO, USER_NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "PETITION_LIKE" WHERE P.PT_NO = PT_NO) PT_LIKE_COUNT FROM "PETITION" P LEFT JOIN "USER" USING (USER_NO) WHERE PT_NO IN (SELECT PT_NO FROM "PETITION_LIKE" L WHERE "USER_NO" = #{UserNo}) AND PT_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT USER_IMG, USER_NICKNAME, USER_ADD, PT_LIKE_DATE, USER_NO, USER_EMAIL FROM "USER" JOIN PETITION_LIKE USING (USER_NO) WHERE PT_NO = ${petitionNo} AND USER_GRADE = 1 ORDER BY PT_LIKE_NO DESC

SELECT USER_IMG, USER_NICKNAME, USER_ADD, USER_NO, TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(PT_LIKE_DATE) || '일 ' || FLOOR(MOD((SYSDATE - PT_LIKE_DATE) * 24, 24)) || '시간 ' || FLOOR(MOD((SYSDATE - PT_LIKE_DATE) * 1440, 60)) || '분' AS PT_LIKE_DATE FROM "USER" JOIN PETITION_LIKE USING (USER_NO) WHERE PT_NO = ${petitionNo} AND USER_GRADE = 1 ORDER BY PT_LIKE_NO DESC

SELECT CM_NO, USER_NICKNAME, USER_IMG, CM_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CM_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT_RESP R WHERE R.CM_NO = C.CM_NO AND CM_FL = 'Y') CM_FLY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT_RESP R WHERE R.CM_NO = C.CM_NO AND CM_FL = 'N') CM_FLN FROM "COMMENT" C JOIN "USER" USING (USER_NO) WHERE PT_NO = ${petitionNo} AND CM_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CM_NO DESC
SELECT PT_VICT FROM "PETITION" WHERE PT_NO = ${petitionNo} AND PT_DEL_FL ='N'
